title: STUNNING VIEWS FROM THIS APARTMENT!
posting_body: ['Kodo', '2867 Sunset Pl, Los Angeles, CA, 90005', 'Want more info on this unit?', 'See the link (below):', '<URL>', 'Call Now:', 'show contact info', 'x 5', 'OR Text', '5', 'to', 'show contact info', 'to contact our team.', 'LUXURY BOUTIQUE STYLE LIVING.', 'This is a 1 Bedroom, 1 Bath, approximately 631 Sq.', 'Ft.', 'At KODO, we’re inspired by the connection and creativity that life in our neighborhood affords.', 'Here, residents are set within the heart of one of L.A.’s trendiest neighborhoods while moments from the cultural vibrancy of Downtown Los Angeles.', 'Home to several of L.A.’s best clubs, bars, live music venues and restaurants, Koreatown and Mid Wilshire are renowned for their nightlife and dining options, while the artistic allure of DTLA is a mere stone’s throw away.', 'Features', '- Electronic Thermostat', '- Granite', '- Microwave', '- Dishwasher - select units', '- Gas Range', '- Window Coverings', '- Refrigerator', '- Large Closets', '- High Ceilings', '- Pets - Max 2 allowed*', '- Washer and Dryer in Unit', '- Hardwood Floors', '- Patio/Balcony - select units', '- Cable Ready', 'Community Amenities', '- Elevator', '- 24-hour Fitness Center Access', '- Assigned Underground Parking Available*', '- Resident Lounge', '- Controlled Access Building', '- Zen Courtyard and Co-working space', '- 24/7 Concierge Dry Cleaning*', '- The Rooftop Lounge with Stunning Views of Downtown Los Angeles', '- Dog Walking Service Available upon request*', '- Private Conference Room', '- Complimentary High-speed Internet access', 'Driving Directions', 'From Wilshire Blvd Eastbound: Make a Right on Wilshire Place & a Left on Sunset Place.', 'From Wilshire Blvd Westbound: Make a Left on Hoover, Right on 7th St, Right onto Wilshire Place & Right onto Sunset Place', 'Office Hours', 'Tuesday-Saturday:9:00AM-6:00PM', 'Pet Policy', 'Pet friendly, contact for details.', 'Income Requirements:', 'Verifiable Income Equal to or Greater than 2.5x Monthly Rent', 'Prices are subject to change, based on availability and qualification of the applicant, additional fees may apply.', 'AMC-CA, Inc. dba Apartment Management Consultants-BRE #01525033', 'iYKOQGWM4P']
